entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:05 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 07:06 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
